summary: Offline (data-free) single-player game where the user roleplays a fake K-pop idol career (soloist or survival show), can create or choose an entertainment company, customize identity details, and submit real voice/photo/video performances that are judged by in-game "fake judges" to provide improvement feedback.
architectural_notes: App is intended to be offline/data-free (no online dependency).
Requires access to device microphone and camera/photo library for auditions and performance submissions.
known_issues: Potential conflict: "fake judges" giving meaningful feedback on real voice/video may require on-device ML; offline requirement may limit capability/performance.
Using real-world/"already existing" entertainment companies could raise IP/branding/legal concerns; may need fictionalized names/logos.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Game logo with playful K-pop stage typography (kpop-idol-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide stage background with spotlights and confetti, dark theme with hot pink and gold accents (kpop-stage-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Judge avatar portrait 1, stylized cartoon, neon rim light (judge-avatar-1.dim_512x512.png)
- Judge avatar portrait 2, stylized cartoon, glamorous fashion (judge-avatar-2.dim_512x512.png)
- Judge avatar portrait 3, stylized cartoon, street/hip-hop vibe (judge-avatar-3.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create the core single-player game flow with two career paths: (1) Soloist career mode and (2) Survival show storyline mode. The user must be able to start a new game, continue an existing game, and reset progress.
Implement player profile/character setup for the user’s fake K-pop life, including selectable gender, nationality, and age, and store it as part of game state.

Implement an entertainment company (agency) system where the player can either (a) create a custom agency (name + optional short description) or (b) choose from a predefined list of agencies included in the app.

Add offline-friendly media capture/import features that let the user use their real voice for auditions and attach a real photo of themselves as part of their character/audition profile, with all media stored locally on the device (no required upload).

Add offline-friendly performance submission for dancing/rapping (video capture or upload) and allow the user to attach it to a specific audition/performance event in the chosen career path, with media stored locally on-device.

Implement in-game “fake judges” that generate coaching-style feedback for each submitted audition/performance using scripted rules (not online AI/ML), based on the player-selected performance type, difficulty, and a short self-rating input.

Ensure the game is “not an online game” in the sense that it is single-player, has no multiplayer features, and does not require any external third-party services/APIs to function; provide an optional sign-in (Internet Identity) mode only for syncing basic text-based progress (excluding large media) if available.

Create a coherent visual theme for the app UI appropriate for a playful K-pop stage vibe (avoid blue/purple as primary colors), and apply it consistently across screens (typography, buttons, panels, and background).

Generate and include a small set of static visual assets (logo, background, judge avatars) and render them from the frontend as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (no backend image routing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Career mode paths: become a fake K-pop idol as soloist or join a survival show storyline
Player profile/character setup: choose gender, nationality, and age for the fake K-pop life
Entertainment company system: create your own agency or select an existing agency
Performance submission features: record/use real voice for auditions and submit a real photo of the user
Performance submission features: capture/submit dancing/rapping performance (e.g., video) for evaluation
In-game judging/feedback: "fake judges" evaluate submissions and provide coaching-style improvement feedback
Offline/data-free gameplay mode (not an online game)

projectName: Offline-friendly single-player K-pop idol career game (soloist or survival show) with media submissions and scripted judge feedback
